website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for customers who are looking for a mattress with foam and cool construction that provides firm support.
pros: Built with both foam layers and pocketed coils for support that appeals to anyone who likes a firm mattress
Available in twin and twin XL
Top layer is breathable and helps keep you cool as you sleep
cons: May seem too hard for those who don't like a very firm mattress
Some owners with back issues felt that it aggravated their problems

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase unless you like pain
customer_reviews.text: At $1600 we expected to get a couple years out of a mattress, but after 10 months we threw it out. No support at all. We woke up in pain everyday. Spent a small fortune on mattress toppers and anything else that would help, but nothing did.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbpix

customer_reviews.title: My chronic lower back pain is GONE.  Sapira is a magic mattress!
customer_reviews.text: My chronic lower back pain is GONE like magic. I'm so happy waking up with no pain and my body feels much lighter every morning. I should have bought this Sapira mattress a year ago when my friend let me sleep on it for 3 nights. I fell in love with this mattress back then, so I was trying to save some money. I'm so glad I decided to spend the money for myself. It's truly life changing mattress. Perfectly firm and when my dog walks by on this mattress, I don't even feel the movement. It came in a heavy box but it was very easy to open and set it up.
customer_reviews.author: NICO

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever
customer_reviews.text: Best bed ever. If you have back pain don't hesitate about getting this bed. I've had inner springs and memory foam but this is in a league of its on.
customer_reviews.author: marshall t gibson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Wife and I are stomach and side sleepers. The firmness of this mattress is about a 7/10 and offers plenty of support. I use to feel hot spots and pressure with my softer pillow-top mattress but no longer with this. I am hoping it lasts for a long time and we are excited (so far) about our new mattress....especially b/c of the price.
customer_reviews.author: BestAmazonReviews

customer_reviews.title: A lot of hype, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the mattress, after all the wonderful reviews. There was motion transfer when the other person moved and yes the foam top does make you very hot and this is from someone who is always frozen! It's very expensive and underwhelming to feel like you are sleeping on a hot beach of sand. We like a firm sprung bed with a little padding and not to feel your partner rolling over. I hope this is helpful and saves anyone else having to send it back disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed but much firmer than we thought
customer_reviews.text: We'd read a lot of reviews where this way rated arbitrarily as 5.5 or 6 out of 10 firmness. This bed is actually quite firm. More like an 8. Too firm for our liking.
customer_reviews.author: banana

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mattress yet!
customer_reviews.text: When the box came, a was more than a little weary about how I was going to like the mattress. We took it out of the box and it was cool to hear the springs popping and to see the mattress take shape. We let the mattress sit for several hours before sleeping on it. It is SO comfortable! Absolutely love it. I would highly recommend. The memory foam top is so great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for me. I change positions throughout my sleep cycle. I work long hours and I am on my feet most of the time. I no longer wake with lower back pain. The support is very good. It’s a bit firmer than I expected. I researched several mattress before purchasing this one. I decided to give it a try and couldn’t be happier. I purchased a king and use a wooden platform bed frame with slats that are about 2 inches apart. The bed frame was made by KDFrames which I also purchased from amazon and together it’s been a great improvement for my aching joints.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Mattress
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I needed a new mattress and he did not want to get a memory foam mattress and I didn't like the feeling of most spring mattresses, After reading hours of reviews and recommendations I decided to get this hybrid. It is at a good price for the quality of the product. I am so glad I didn't cheap out on my mattress. I would recommend this to anyone! No more back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable bed ever. Waking up without pain for the first time in years cannot be underrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better!
customer_reviews.text: We've had our Leesa Mattress for about a year now, we're both in our 70s have chronic back pain plus arthritis. This mattress is the best one we've ever slept on, and I'm talking many mattresses in 50 yrs. I sleep so well I don't want to get up in the morning. This will probably be our last one but it's the best one. Only one complaint, putting on the bottom fitted sheet is tricky cause the mattress is very heavy but with the help of my husband we get it done. Happy sleeper!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lord

customer_reviews.title: Literally fall to sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is well made, soft but not too soft, comfortable and all that BUT the single biggest attribute IMO is the height it allows you to sleep at. There is nothing quite like literally falling into a quality king size bed 😴. BTW don’t believe the bs about king size bed frames and bedding costing an arm and a leg, the price difference is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CC from Kirkland (Seattle's Riviera)

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: My back pain gone!! .it shapes perfectly with my spin, when i slept before i use to have lower back and groin pain cause i didn't have the right support and i felt that i need adjustments all the time . worth every penny . very happy so far and i have it for few months now. softness i would say 8 out 10,not 7! so its more on the firm side but no too firm. so i was hesitant at first feeling. then after few nights of sleep i saw the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzi S

customer_reviews.title: Rated top mattress for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this mattress did not perform the way it supposes to work, the top is hard and for a side sleeper does not work
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Alferez

customer_reviews.title: Not that firm, marginal support
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and efficient. However. I don’t live it. Too much give, lack’s firmness. It’s not terrible, a little more comfortable then old one but it’s not that firm. Based on other comments and reviews I think their manufacturing consistency is different because many people say it’s super firm, mine is not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It changed my life!!
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this mattress, i would wake up every morning feeling like i was 90 years old (I’m only 42) my back ached so badly. After only ONE night of sleeping on my new Leesa Sapira, i woke up with no pain whatsoever!! I adore this mattress and can’t wait to go to sleep at night. If you’re in need of a new mattress, i highly recommend it. It’s firm, but amazingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress to help with sciatic pain at night— I wasn’t expecting a miracle cure but it HAS helped although I still have some pain night. Overall it’s a very comfortable mattress. It immediately plumped up after unpacking. I definitely recommend it—very glad I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress. I was concerned about a mattress in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. I was concerned about a mattress in a box, but was truly amazed on how well and firm it was after it expanded. It does take some time for the smell to go away.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love our mattress
customer_reviews.text: I spent a fair amount of time researching mattresses and so far I am thrilled with my decision. My wife and I went on a short vacation over the holiday and when we returned we both noticed immediately how much more comfortable our bed was versus the various hotels we had stayed at during our trip. We were staying at mid-grade hotels with decent accommodations.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not really a Leesa.
customer_reviews.text: First this mattress is a Sephora, I suspect and older stock than Leesa. Apart from the completely botched delivery and difficulty setting up (it is heavy and cumbersome) it is just uncomfortable. I wish I had just purchased a memory foam mattress locally.
customer_reviews.author: 2175miles

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because it is a hybrid and I was unsure of an all foam model. Very happy with purchase. My wife and I are different sleep types - I'm a side sleeper. This mattress is great and price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Much Firmer than Expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a hybrid, but was much firmer than we expected. We found it uncomfortable to sleep on our side.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: More back pain than before, poor Amazon support
customer_reviews.text: Our mattress, purchase directly from Amazon, showed up without it’s box, and the plastic covering had been torn, which went through to the mattress itself. We were willing to overlook the initial damage but the mattress itself is I’m uncomfortable. We had really high hopes but we’ve both had increased back pain *when waking up* Amazon wouldn’t pick up the mattress so we had to dispose of it ourselves. Contacting Leesa directly was more helpful.
customer_reviews.author: StatGeek

customer_reviews.title: nice mattress
customer_reviews.text: Son and daughter-in-law bought one. We slept on it a couple of nights and came home and ordered it. I like the firmness, but it is just a hair firm for my wife. but she is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dann Loew

customer_reviews.title: If you’re reading the reviews, stop here.
customer_reviews.text: You’re obviously looking for a new mattress, right? Do yourself (and your back) a favor and click add to cart on this bad boy. I can’t remember the last time I woke up and my back didn’t hurt...until I started sleeping on this mattress. Pull the trigger on it today. Do it. You’ll thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great app Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Leesa Hybrid we have bought. We now have one on master and one in the guest room. Best comfort and sleep compared to all the mattresses we have had over the past 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. I shopped around for a mattress at the big box stores, but felt like they were over priced. I found the mattress type that was comfortable for my wife and I (a hybrid) and found this mattress online. Love the feel and how comfortable it is. It is a good quality mattress.

customer_reviews.text: If you need a firm mattress forget this one. looks nice, and it would be great if you wanted a plush mattress.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: surprised by petroleum odor that gassed off and took two weeks to dissipate
customer_reviews.text: mattress met my expectations for comfort, back support and firmness. Only negative was the petroleum odor that gassed off when unpacked and took over two weeks to dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES M.

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend to anyone looking for a firmer cooler mattress
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mattress after trying the sleep number and one other memory foam. My husband hated both other alternative but he’s in love with this mattress. Great support. Quickly airs out with no lasting smell. I would recommend to anyone looking for a firmer cooler mattress
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the satisfaction guarantee but won’t need it
customer_reviews.text: More firm than I was expecting but not a bad thing. Like the fact that my girlfriend can move without waking me up. The 100 day guarantee was the deciding factor to purchase the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better than ever.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say it really relieves my arthritis discomfort but I am sleeping better than I have in years. With that said I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest R. Amo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bed, not as firm as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was my first bed-in-a-box and after about 6 weeks I'd call it a success. It's got a soft initial feel that firms up after a few days. However, if you're in the market for a truly firm mattress, you might find the Sapira a little on the softer side. Naturally, the great thing about the Leesa beds? If you don't like it, they'll take it away for you. Initially skeptical, I'm now a true believer in the bed-in-a-box model of buying.
customer_reviews.author: redjellydonut

customer_reviews.title: Bed quit working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: The electronic mechanism on the bed quit working after nine months. No one is replying to my son's emails asking for assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love my Leesa. I have had sleeping problems for years, but I sleep so much better since I got this mattress. I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: We love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress! We both have back problems & this mattress is not too hard or soft, just perfect!

customer_reviews.title: The best mattress I've slept on!
customer_reviews.text: It sure is nice to sleep on this mattress! It does off gass for a few days but after that it's amazing!

customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable mattress I've ever slept on. I don't feel my fiance move or get up at all. Very comfortable east to set up great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was really firm and difficult to get used to. I did get used to it and like it now.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress, tested a few out in the store from other brands and couldn’t be happier with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this item and no need to go to a lame-o bedding store.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Simple set up. Super comfortable and without a doubt, I will be buying another. Awesome.

product_meta.title: Leesa Luxury Hybrid 11 Inch Mattress, Innerspring and Premium Foam, Twin
product_meta.description: Size:TwinThe Leesa Hybrid mattress (formerly the sapira) has been top-rated by industry experts and consumers. The Leesa Hybrid is lease's premium mattress offering, we have meticulously engineered this mattress to provide an unparalleled sleep experience for those who want the best of both worlds providing you the feel and support of springs matched together with the benefits of memory foam such as pressure relief and cooling. The Leesa Hybrid is the first true luxury hybrid mattress designed to compress and ship in a box making for the easiest mattress buying and delivery experience you will find. Plus, you can rest easy knowing you’ve made the right choice With Leesa standard 100-night, risk free trial period and a 5-year manufacturer's.
feature_bullets: Our mattress: The Leesa Hybrid mattress combines premium foam layers with individually-wrapped pocket springs for superior edge to edge support. The Leesa Hybrid mattress was thoughtfully designed with the best of both worlds, featuring a cooling arena foam Top layer, a contouring memory foam recovery layer and an active pocket Spring layer enhanced with edge support.

Rest on luxury: The Leesa Hybrid mattress actively responds and adapts to your body as you sleep, gently pushing back on your pressure points through the night. The hybrid pairing gives reliable, yet luxurious Rest.
Made in the USA: The Leesa Hybrid mattress is designed, assembled and manufactured in the USA with high-performance foams and advanced pocket-spring Coil technology.
Edge support: the Leesa Hybrid mattress features incredible edge-to-edge support thanks to 1, 000+ individually-wrapped pocket springs.

Wrapped in luxury: all Leesa mattresses are covered with our iconic 4 stripe mattress cover. We’ve worked hard to make this highly breathable, virtually seamless mattress cover with no tapered edges one of the most comfortable mattress covers on the market, so you can sleep well.

Our social impact: we set out to create a company with heart—one that measures our success as much by our bottom line as by our impact on the world. We donate one mattress for every 10 We sell (pillows, too) and Volunteer in our local communities.
